creator: Serhii Korovayny
caption: Alina, 10, playing at the playground in Lyman, Donetsk region. She and her mother Natalya are living in the neighbour city of Yampil, which is even closer to the frontline. Here, they visiting Alina's grandma. The city was occupied by Russians and liberated by the Armed Forces of Ukraine in October 2022. The humanitarian situation remains difficult, as remaining residents have no access to gas and water, and limited access to electricity. The city was severely damaged during fighting, majority of buildings were destroyed. These days, Russian army continue shelling Lyman, killing civillians and destroing more houses almost daily.
